attributes.action: Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn both resign, for the sake of national unity.
attributes.background: The country is grid-locked. Neither leader seems able to get their party (and coalition partners) aligned around a common view. Both leaders resign, and each party chooses a new leader, with the agreement that an election will be called in late Spring. New parliament with new thinking solves Brexit.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for these individuals and not the UK Government or Parliament.
